moduleMetadataJson.name: Gather Steam Server Information
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module uses the A2S_INFO request to obtain information from a Steam server.
author: Jon Hart <jon_hart@rapid7.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: BATCHSIZE
options.description: The number of hosts to probe in each set

options.name: ScannerRecvInterval
options.description: The maximum numbers of sends before entering the processing loop

options.name: ScannerMaxResends
options.description: The maximum times to resend a packet when out of buffers

options.name: ScannerRecvQueueLimit
options.description: The maximum queue size before breaking out of the processing loop

options.name: ScannerRecvWindow
options.description: The number of seconds to wait post-scan to catch leftover replies
